name: 100 Foot Rope
description: Easily affixed to an adventurer's pack. Holds up to 1000 pounds of weight.

name: Net
description: Suitable for fishing or restraining opponents in combat.

name: Dinghy
description: Includes oars, and carries up to 4 people or 600 pounds of weight.

name: Lockpick
description: For opening locks. Not sold by decent folk.

name: Guitar, Banjo, Lute, or Harp
description: No included: the skill to play it.

name: Candle
description: Lasts 1 hour; emits only dim light.

name: Lantern
description: Requires oil.

name: Torch
description: Lasts 4 hours

name: Hiking Boots
description: Comfortable, so as to accomodate long journeys.

name: Climbing Boots
description: Includes crampons for the surest of footing.

name: Pickaxe
description: Ideal for dislodging rocks and dirt.

name: Climbing Gear
description: Includes 10 pitons, 3 carabiners, and a harness

name: Scissors
description: Suitable for cutting cloth or paper

name: Portable Alchemy Set
description: Allows brewing potions on the run, though less reliably so than at a proper alchemical laboratory.

name: Steel Looking Glass
description: A finely polished steel mirror.

name: Looking Glass
description: A finely polished glass mirror with silvered backing. No undead or unholy visage shall appear in its frame.

name: Spyglass
description: Allows viewing distant objects at 4x magnification.

name: Spectacles
description: For reading comfort, or restoring sight to the nearsighted adventurer.

name: Magnifying Glass
description: An oddity. Of great use to those inclined to scrutinize objects.

name: Map
description: Conveys a general sense of surrounding terrain.

name: Compass
description: Always points north, except in the presence of magical fields.

name: Navigational Tools
description: An astrolabe and sextant, used by mariners to determine approximate positioning ascertain the distance to landmarks of known height.

name: Ruler
description: Measures lengths, up to 12 inches.

name: Medical Kit
description: Includes bandages, sutures, and antiseptic.

name: Ladder
description: 10 foot, when unfolded.

name: Pole
description: 10 foot, of oak.

name: Ram
description: For when lockpicks fail thee

name: Tent
description: Suitable for two, or one king.
